name: Save Gorilla - Endless Arcade Chase Challenge
name_original: Save Gorilla - Endless Arcade Chase Challenge
description:
Help the Gorilla leave the island before he is fenced in!

Tap at the correct time to move him to the next platform!
Tap at the wrong time and he will fall off!
Test your coordination and accuracy!

Download Save Gorilla now!

Follow us for updates and new games!
